message.content:
{"id": "13725", 
"title": "Revert is much slower than close and reopen in Java editor", 
"description": "When I answer 'no' to the 'do you want to save changes' dialog and then double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it, the file is reopened quickly. However, if I repeat steps 1) and 2), and then select 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the editor, it takes approximately 15 seconds to replace the contents of the window with the original file's contents.", 
"OB": "Open a file in the Java editor, make some changes, and save it. Reopen the file by double-clicking on it in the file navigator without saving the changes. Note the quick response time for reopening the file without saving changes.", 
"EB": "When selecting 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the Java editor, the time it takes to replace the contents of the window with the original file's contents is significantly slower compared to simply closing and reopening the file.", 
"SR": "Investigate the cause of the delay when using 'Revert' in the Java editor and optimize the process for faster execution."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '13725', 'title': 'Bug 13725Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.', 'description': 'Bug 13725Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor. ', 'OB': 'answer "no" to the "do you want to save changes" dialog double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it.However, if I repeat steps 1) and 2), and then select "Revert" from the pop upmenu in the editor it takes15 seconds to replace the contents of the windowwith the original. ', 'EB': '', 'SR': ''}
